The claim is based on a misleading artic: which used a sensational headline to suggest that President Obama had started confiscating guns "by force." This aspect highlights the source of the claim and questions its credibility.
The expert: s verdict also mentions that the claim refers to an article titled "Forceful Gun Confiscation Begins in California," published by Mr. Conservative in 2013. This aspect shows that the claim is not recent and that no actual gun confiscation by force occurred in California between 2013 and the time of the expert's verdict.
